header.gameNote: NAISMITH MEMORIAL HALL OF FAME TIP-OFF

article.description: Joshua Braun hit five 3-pointers and scored 25 points, DeWayne Russell added 23 points and seven assists and Grand Canyon beat Marist 84-72 in the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame Tip-Of
article.headline: Grand Canyon defeats Marist 84-72
article.story: UNCASVILLE, Conn. -- Joshua Braun hit five 3-pointers and scored 25 points, DeWayne Russell added 23 points and seven assists and Grand Canyon beat Marist 84-72 in the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame Tip-Off on Sunday. Darion Clark scored 14, on 6-of-8 shooting, with nine rebounds and three steals in 21 minutes before fouling out and Keonta Vernon added 13 points for Grand Canyon. Grand Canyon (2-2) never trailed, scored the first eight points and took a 49-36 lead into halftime. Isaiah Lamb scored Marist's first six points of the second half as the Red Foxes pulled within nine. But the Antelopes answered with a 9-2 spurt -- including two 3s by Braun -- to make it 60-44 with 13:50 remaining and led by double figures the rest of the way. GCU made 19 of 31 (61 percent) from the field in the first half. Brian Parker led Marist (1-4) with 21 points on 8-of-10 shooting.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
